decision_conditions: It is recommended that these trees and shrubs on right hand side of swimming pool in rear garden closest to the property, removal of two self sown Sycamore and holly trees, removal of Pittosporum and associated shrubs, along flank of Swimming Pool. Cut back Laurel to fence line and reducing overhang to existing pump house and Swimming pool.
Magnolia to front left hand lawn, crown lift 4m to front of property, overall crown reduce by 30% and crown thin by 10%

It is suggested that you engage the services of a qualified and fully insured tree surgeon to carry out the above work on your behalf (you should ask to see the contractor's insurance certificate and make sure that it is up to date).

Having considered the particular circumstances of the case and the position of the trees for which consent to fell has been granted the Council has decided that it will not be necessary to replace the trees.

Please note that if the work for which consent is granted is not carried out within 2 years of the date of this letter, it will be necessary to submit a fresh application if it is intended to implement the work.
description:
On right hand side of swimming pool in rear garden closest to the property, removal of two self sown Sycamore and holly trees, removal of Pittosporum and associated shrubs, along flank of Swimming Pool. Cut back Laurel to fence line and reducing overhang to existing pump house and Swimming pool.
 
Magnolia to front left hand lawn, crown lift 4m to front of property, overall crown reduce by 30% and crown thin by 10%
